## Цвет {#appendix-design-color}


### Цветовая модель {#appendix-design-color-model}

#### RGB {#appendix-design-color-rgb}

$$
256 \cdot 256 \cdot 256 = 256^3 = 16\,777\,216
$$

#### HEX {#appendix-design-color-hex}

$$
\text{FF}_{16} = 15 \cdot 16^1 + 15 \cdot 16^0 = 255
$$

$$
\text{FF}\,\text{FF}\,\text{FF}_{16} = 15 \cdot 16^5 + 15 \cdot 16^4 + 15 \cdot 16^3 + 15 \cdot 16^2 + 15 \cdot 16^1 + 15 \cdot 16^0 = 16\,777\,215
$$

#### HSL (HSI) {#appendix-design-color-hsl}

Hue Saturation Lightness (Intensity)

$$
\begin{split}
H & \in [0, 360^\circ] \\
S & \in [0, 100] \\
L & \in [0, 100]
\end{split}
$$

$$
360 \cdot 101 \cdot 101 = 3\,672\,360
$$

#### HSB (HSV) {#appendix-design-color-hsb}

Hue Saturation Brightness (Value)

$$
\begin{split}
\text{H} & \in [0, 360^\circ] \\
\text{S} & \in [0, 100] \\
\text{B} & \in [0, 100]
\end{split}
$$

$$
360 \cdot 101 \cdot 101 = 3\,672\,360
$$
